segments.text: I'm standing here, just observing this kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that strikes me is the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming quite a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the faucet is still running at full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing right there seems completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually in the water already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is entirely fixed on that one task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wonder how she could miss something so obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause some serious damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is quite astonishing to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
